title: Child and Family Health Nursing Practical Readiness Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing theory knowledge and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Work-based learning and mentoring enhancement programs for current practitioners, conducted in blended learning environments with digital devices

learning_goals: Learners achieve core clinical competencies of child and family health nursing at 80% or higher proficiency
Learners analyze problem-solving scenarios based on real-world cases with 90% accuracy
Learners share practical knowledge at 70% or higher proficiency through collaborative learning activities with peers and mentors
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
